problem.p: At which of the points identified in the image do you expect the bending stress to be the highest? Assume that the beam cross-sectional shape and material are constant along the length.

choicegroup.label: At which of the points identified in the image do you expect the bending stress to be the highest? Assume that the beam cross-sectional shape and material are constant along the length.

problem.p: At which of the points identified in the image do you expect the shear force to be the highest? Assume that the beam cross-sectional shape and material are constant along the length.
